modName: Alternate start - Based on A Poor Man
summary:
Savegame with Main Quest disabled - No Map Markers.
Start at Solitude Docks with nothing but some ratty clothes.
Based on \"A Poor Man\"
descriptionHtml:
ALTERNATE START

===BASED ON \"A Poor Man\"===
Basically, it\'s \"A Poor Man\", with minor changes.
ItÂ´s called \'Skyrim Alternate Reality Savegame\' now, and it\'s by StannieDum, so all credits go to him.
It can be found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5720
It has been superceded by this mod: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10929
Although I haven\'t played that one, I recommend you do, because it\'s worked out way better, according to the descripton.
Special thanks to Arbabender, for finding the original mod and pointing it out to me.

==========================

It\'s just a simple savegame, just with the main quest disabled, and no map 
markers yet discovered.

You start off on a small ship at the Solitude Docks, nothing but shaggy clothes 
you\'d have as a prisoner. 
You\'re an Imperial named Crassius, but that\'s just the character I created for myself.

Just open the console and type  \"showracemenu\" (Obiously without the \", but 
I figured you\'d be smarter than that.) and make yourself a new character.

If you want to start anywhere else, go to www.skyrimsearch.com, 
look up which cell you want to start in, and type \"coc <chosen starting cell>\" 
(Again, don\'t be stupid.) and then you\'ll just have to finish it off with a nice
 \"tmm 0\" to disable the map markers again.
Different starting gear? Dump those rags, and conjure yourself a nice set of 
clothing, a fancy blade, or even a complete set of armor using the \"player.additem <form ID>\" 
command.

This way, you can create your very own start with your own backstory, for a 
way more immersive and enjoyable game.
author: Winlok
